title: T5 Portable drives
extract: Portable hard drives are the answer and the Samsung Portable SSD T5 is the big daddy of them all. ... For a modern USB-C capable device you're going to get huge transfer speeds – up to 540MB/s, meaning you can drag and drop your files, and even work directly from the portable external disk.Jan 22, 2018
extract_html: Portable hard drives are the answer and the Samsung Portable SSD T5 is the big daddy of them all. ... For a modern USB-C capable device you're going to get huge transfer speeds – up to 540MB/s, meaning you can drag and drop your files, and even work directly from the portable external disk.Jan 22, 2018
